data.description:
Aim XR is a 5v5 fast-paced multiplayer shooter. Play online with people, or play offline against bots. You can also host a LAN server, and play with users on the same WiFi network.

You can also play sitting down, by using the height adjustment slider.

In order to maximize comfort, tunnel vision is activated when moving via the joystick. You can disable the tunnel vision via the Settings menu.

changelog.change_log:
* Show friend list
* Show which servers in the list have friends in them
* Prevent grabbing ejected magzines
* Show video for tip about muting players

* Show friend list
* Show which servers in the list have friends in them
* Prevent grabbing ejected magzines
* Show video for tip about muting players

* Added kill streak announcer
* Made server list scrollable via thumbstick
* When crouch too low, reset user to lowest acceptable crouch height
* Fixed admin audio clips having too long a reverb tail
* Fixed performance issue with 0.6.13

* Added kill streak announcer
* Made server list scrollable via thumbstick
* When crouch too low, reset user to lowest acceptable crouch height
* Fixed admin audio clips having too long a reverb tail

CHANGE LOG
* Names of teammates are now always shown. It's also easier to see enemy names if you are close and looking at them
* Buffed shotgun. Decreased bullet spread and make it eaiser to hold and pump
* Implemented new height calibration
* Weapon images are now shown in kill feed instead of silhouette
* Killer info is shown when killed by enemy
* Added toggle for Voice Chat in Audio settings. For players that don't want any voice chat active
* Added sort options for server list
  * Sort by latency
  * Sort by players
* Made server list scrollable via drag
- Added keyboard so that can enter password to private servers

- Fixed connecting LAN servers in the server list
- Fixed grenades not rolling
- Fixed model LODs being too expensive when model quality is set to high or very high

* Updated audio for grenades
* Added model quality setting
* Updated virtual stock settings UI

- Implemented new buy menu. Now both teams has access to all guns
- Now servers are ordered by player count, and then ping
- Hopefully fixed bugs with audio cutting out
